FuncDef: The display vrrp statistics command displays the current VRRP status, configured parameters, and statistics about the sent and received VRRP Advertisement packets. The display vrrp statistics command displays the current VRRP status, configured parameters, and statistics about the sent and received VRRP Advertisement packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name, type, and number of an interface.
-

Specifies the ID of a VRRP group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

ExtraInfo: After a VRRP group is configured, run the display vrrp statistics command to view statistics about sent and received VRRP Advertisement packets.
